tRr1axdko9GUcR5tr.name: Constriction Attack
tRr1axdko9GUcR5tr.notes: If you succeed on a grapple against an opponent no larger than your own SM, on your next turn, and each successive turn, roll a Quick Contest of your ST vs. your victim’s ST or HT, whichever is higher. If you win, your victim takes damage equal to your margin of victory; otherwise, no damage is inflicted

md46_gPvsLZUO9v6E.name: Oxygen Storage
md46_gPvsLZUO9v6E.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

msxkgDfQIiKzmuvHm.name: Oxygen Storage
msxkgDfQIiKzmuvHm.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mRoy31h80q-TCj2sk.name: Oxygen Storage
mRoy31h80q-TCj2sk.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mbef5166_ivD0y7AE.name: Oxygen Storage
mbef5166_ivD0y7AE.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mmzWvtsH-2WkevOTi.name: Oxygen Storage
mmzWvtsH-2WkevOTi.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mRM_QNdEdYPO19Xw2.name: Diffuse
mRM_QNdEdYPO19Xw2.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

m6tIqaWy2Wl_alk76.name: Homogenous
m6tIqaWy2Wl_alk76.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

ma5BhpMVh0VeGtSXg.name: No Blood
ma5BhpMVh0VeGtSXg.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

m9T8NQP21QabSZ4B0.name: No Brain
m9T8NQP21QabSZ4B0.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mjH78FiU-vDmZMD8a.name: No Eyes
mjH78FiU-vDmZMD8a.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mmqbSq6RmY4Fo2vdb.name: No Head
mmqbSq6RmY4Fo2vdb.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mLkJDRpqQZR6DdHvf.name: No Neck
mLkJDRpqQZR6DdHvf.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m28laY5XtoDwZptCO.name: No Vitals
m28laY5XtoDwZptCO.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

m8cxt_d2hcso6FX0w.name: Unliving
m8cxt_d2hcso6FX0w.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
